meanings.definition: A feeling of discontent or covetousness with regard to another's advantages, success, possessions, etc.
meanings.sent1: Her envies towards her friend's new phone were evident.
meanings.sent2: The envies of the students towards the class topper were palpable.
meanings.sent3: His envies towards his brother's ice cream cone made him crave one too.
meanings.sent4: The green monster of envies gnawed at her heart as she watched others succeed.
meanings.sent5: The burning envies within her turned into motivation to work harder.

meanings.definition: To feel discontent or covetousness with regard to another's advantages, success, possessions, etc.
meanings.sent1: She envies her colleague's ability to work efficiently.
meanings.sent2: He envies his friend's new car and wishes he had one too.
meanings.sent3: The cat envies the dog's ability to go for walks outside.
meanings.sent4: His heart envies the freedom of the birds soaring high in the sky.
meanings.sent5: She envies the confidence of her sister and hopes to be as self-assured one day.
